name: Luminous Champion Aloft
flavor: They shine vibrantly, a beautiful diamond in the night sky.

metadata.flavor: They shine vibrantly, a beautiful diamond in the night sky.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The target has a +3 bonus to speed, they can fly, and their abilities ignore concealment. Additionally, whenever the target gains their Heroic Resource, they gain 1 additional Heroic Resource. This effect lasts until the start of your next turn.

effects.name: Persistent 1
effects.effect: The effect lasts until the start of your next turn.
